s: WHAT IS BLITZART? We are based in sunny Southern California, our products are influenced by its outdoor lifestyle, surf and skateboard culture. Blitzart is driven in providing innovative and high quality gear accessible to all. Please follow us on social media for deals and latest product launches.

t: Amazon.com: BLITZART Huracane 38" Dual Brushless Hub-Motor Electric Skateboard Longboard 3.3" PU Wheels (Orange) : Sports & Outdoors
s: I’m 5 foot 8 and weigh 180 lbs. and this board has no problem getting me around. On the low speed on a flat surface I can get to speeds of 10-12 mph which is plenty fast. Even though blitzart says this board can go 23 mph I was not able to reach that top speed.
I've actually bought 2 electric ... as well and at 230lbs there haven't been any issues. When my daughter gets old enough I'll probably buy a third. Good work BLITZART!...

Seriously, I have been long boarding for over 10 years now and I haven’t been able to get the speed on my other boards that I have been able to achieve on this Blitzart board. I actually bought it used and it is in perfect condition as if I bought it brand new.
